frontend/src/components/ui/Icon.tsx.description: UI component pattern: Export props interface with JSDoc, functional component, cn() from @/lib/utils for className merging. Design tokens via CSS vars (--radius-sm, --shadow-card). Semantic colors (bg-text, text-surface). This is the pattern Tooltip.tsx must follow.

frontend/src/components/ui/Icon.test.tsx.description: Test pattern: describe/it blocks, @testing-library/react, screen queries. No setupFilesAfterSetup needed for basic tests. vitest + RTL. For Tooltip tests: use vi.useFakeTimers({ shouldAdvanceTime: true }), hover wrapping span (.closest('span')!), advance 400ms, assert getByRole('tooltip').
